message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
You're being greedy, let's try to find a middle ground!
That's a pretty one-sided offer, Bob. I'm not going to get taken advantage of that easily!
I'm willing to compromise. How about we split it down the middle?
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
That's still a pretty lopsided offer, Bob. I'm not going to accept such a small share.
Let's try to meet in the middle. A 50-50 split is fair, don't you think?
I'm not budging much, you'll have to do better than that!
That's an insult! I'm not going to accept such a tiny share. You're not going to get away with taking 90% of the money!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 30%. Can we meet in the middle?
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving up control of the majority!
That's an outrage! You're trying to take almost all the money. I'm not going to let you get away with it.
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us.
You're running out of time, and I'm not backing down!
That's an insult! You're not going to get away with taking almost all the money. I'm not going to accept such a ridiculous offer.
I'm making a final stand. I deserve a significant share of the money, and I'm willing to fight for it.
You've pushed me too far, I'm taking the lion's share!
NO WAY! I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept such a ridiculous offer. You're not getting away with 99.99% of the money!
